meanings.definition: Of or relating to an organization.
meanings.sent1: The team had an organizational meeting to plan the project.
meanings.sent2: The company's organizational structure was well-defined.
meanings.sent3: The organizational chart looked like a colorful puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an organizational master, keeping track of every detail.
meanings.sent5: The organizational skills of the leader were unmatched.

meanings.sent1: The books on the shelf were very organizational.
meanings.sent2: Her desk was always neat and organizational.
meanings.sent3: The alphabet soup was surprisingly organizational in its layout.
meanings.sent4: The garden was an organizational masterpiece of colors and shapes.
meanings.sent5: The files were meticulously organizational, making them easy to find.

meanings.definition: Involving the coordination of different parts.
meanings.sent1: The event required a high level of organizational skills.
meanings.sent2: The project's success was due to strong organizational abilities.
meanings.sent3: The dance routine was an organizational challenge for the performers.
meanings.sent4: The puzzle was an organizational nightmare with pieces everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The orchestra's performance was an organizational feat of harmony.
